title: Dispatcher Operasional Dump Truck
description:
Penempatan: CAKUNG – JAKARTA TIMUR
Berpengalaman dibidang expedisi/logistic/ trucking minimal 1 tahun

Tanggung Jawab Pekerjaan :

Menghadapi driver, dan menyelesaikan masalah yang terjadi lapangan
Melakukan monitoring truk, monitoring GPS, dan driver
Membuat laporan untuk customer maupun management

Keahlian :

Requied candidates who have quick thinking and able to work under pressure and fast paced environment
Mahir dan menguasai peta JAWA dan kota- kota hub penting di area jawa

Kualifikasi :

Laki-laki
Candidate must possess at least a SMU, Diploma, Bachelor’s Degree, Logistic/Transportation or equivalent.
At least 1 year(s) of working experience in the related field is required for this position, LULUSAN BARU DAPAT DIPERTIMBANGKAN
Applicants must be willing to work in cakung
Preferably Staff (non-management & non-supervisor)s specializing in Logistics/Supply Chain or equivalent.

Waktu Bekerja :
Senin – Sabtu
Tunjangan :

Uang Makan
Uang Transport
Bonus Ritase

Insentif :

Bonus kinerja
